tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_efficiency_initiatives (
  community_id INT,
  initiative_name TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  energy_savings DECIMAL,
  impact_on_sustainability TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE initiatives (
    initiative_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    community_id INT,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    energy_saved DECIMAL
);
CREATE TABLE communities (
    community_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    community_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    sustainability_goal VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE community_energy_initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    community_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    initiative_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    estimated_energy_savings FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE initiative_participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_id INT,
    participant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    join_date DATE,
    role VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    community_name VARCHAR(50),
    consumption_date DATE,
    consumption_kwh FLOAT,
    initiative_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    community_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (community_id) REFERENCES communities(community_id)
);

CREATE TABLE initiatives_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR,
    metric_value DECIMAL,
    initiative_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES initiatives(initiative_id)
);

CREATE TABLE organizations_initiatives (
    organization_id INT,
    initiative_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (organization_id, initiative_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (organization_id) REFERENCES organizations(organization_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES initiatives(initiative_id)
);
